name: cheapest_tickets
description: Returns the cheapest non-stop tickets, as well as tickets with 1 or 2 stops, for the selected route with departure/return date filters.

origin.description: IATA code of the departure city.

destination.description: IATA code of the destination city (for all routes, enter -)

depart_date.description: Day or month of departure (yyyy-mm-dd or yyyy-mm).

return_date.description: Day or month of return (yyyy-mm-dd or yyyy-mm).

page.description: By default the page displays 100 found prices. 1(default) is the first page.

name: cheapest_direct_tickets
description: Returns the cheapest non-stop tickets for the selected route with departure/return date filters.

origin.description: IATA code of the departure city.

destination.description: IATA code of the destination city (for all routes, enter -)

depart_date.description: Day or month of departure (yyyy-mm-dd or yyyy-mm).

return_date.description: Day or month of return (yyyy-mm-dd or yyyy-mm).

name: cheapest_tickets_each_day
description: Returns the cheapest non-stop, one-stop, and two-stop flights for each of the next 30 days after a specified day.

origin.description: IATA code of the departure city.

destination.description: IATA code of the destination city (for all routes, enter -)

depart_date.description: Day or month of departure (yyyy-mm-dd or yyyy-mm).

return_date.description: Day or month of return (yyyy-mm-dd or yyyy-mm).

calendar_type.description: Field used to build the calendar. Equal to either: departure_date (default) or return_date.

length.description: Length of stay in the destination city.

name: cheapest_tickets_each_month
description: Returns the cheapest non-stop tickets, as well as tickets with 1 or 2 stops, for the selected route grouped by month.

origin.description: IATA code of the departure city.

destination.description: IATA code of the destination city (for all routes, enter -)

name: popular_airline_routes
description: Returns routes for which an airline operates flights, sorted by popularity.

limit.description: Records limit per page. Default value is 10.

name: popular_directions_from_city
description: Brings the most popular directions from a specified city back.

origin.description: IATA code of the departure city.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
